data.title: Men's and women's tennis teams start seasons on winning streaks
data.description: Men's and women's tennis began their competitive seasons a few weeks ago - the men on Jan. 14 with a doubleheader sweep against the United States Naval Academy and the women on Jan. 21 with a 5-2 defeat of St. John's University. Neither team has lost a match since their respective season-opening victories.Men's head coach Xander Centari said that he is thrilled about the start to the season and his team's potential for success in the Ivy League this spring."We're just taking it one match at a time," men's head coach Xander Centari said.
